EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hi Christine, I hope you had a good week, just wanted to follow up to see if you had an opportunity to complete the Grand & Toy business account application for optimal savings? I look forward to working with you. Thank you
Kind Regards, Kyle Kyle McGuire Business Development Manager, Canada 900 Belfast Road, Ottawa, ON, K1G 0Z6 E-mail: kylemcguire@grandandtoy.com |Tel: 613-244-4023 Toll Free: 800-348-2184 ext. 44023 Fax: 613-244-0765
